response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit you. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $13,500. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is slightly above its intrinsic value to us, ensuring both a fair transaction and a valuable addition to your collection. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 13500}
